            About Me
            I am a data scientist interested in legislative
            redistricting, financial markets, and rugby football. I
            major in Political Science and minor in Japanese Literature
            and Arts. I am also working as a performance data analyst of
            the varsity rugby team.
            
            
            Education
            Keio University | Tokyo, Japan
            L.L.B in Political Science | April 2019 - March 2023
            Harvard College | Cambridge, MA
            Visiting Undergraduate Student | August 2020 - May
            2011
